name: Ragtime
description: Ragtime tells the story of three groups in the United States in the early 20th century: African Americans, upper-class suburbanites, in New Rochelle, and Eastern European immigrants.

name: Les Miserables
description: Set in early 19th-century France, Les Mis√©rables is the story of Jean Valjean, a French peasant, and his desire for redemption after serving nineteen years in jail for having stolen a loaf of bread for his sister's starving child.

name: Hamilton
description: the life of American Founding Father Alexander Hamilton, with music, lyrics and book by Lin-Manuel Miranda, inspired by the 2004 biography Alexander Hamilton by historian Ron Chernow

text: Harry Porter and the Cursed Child
name: Harry Potter and the Cursed Child
description: a British two-part stage play written by Jack Thorne based on an original story by Thorne, J. K. Rowling and John Tiffany.
